name: dailypick
description: A fun and interactive collection of mini-games designed to liven up team activities! Perfect for adding a bit of engagement to daily meetings or team-building sessions

scripts.assets:copy: if [ -d public ]; then cp -r public/. dist/; fi; if [ -d _site ]; then mkdir -p dist/blog && cp -r _site/. dist/blog/; fi
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run eleventy:build && npm run parcel:build && npm run assets:copy
